entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
